name.namePart: A lipid atlas of human and mouse immune cells provides insights into ferroptosis susceptibility

collection.subject: lipids concentrations
immune cell analysis
Cell metabolism
Cellular immunology
Medical biochemistry - lipids
collection.description:
Human mouse lipid atlas lipidomics data - Lipid species data (concentration pmol/umol total membrane lipidome) generated by targeted mass spectrometry from 16 different human immune cell types and 8 different mouse immune cell types. This data is the raw data used to generate the figures shown in Figure 1 and Figure 2 (as well as various Extended data figures).

Fig4h-k, Supp Fig6 - ML210 24h lipidomics: Lipidomic data set of immune cells treated with ML210 +/- ferrostatin-1

Fig6, Supp Fig7 - T cell lipidomics: Lipidomic data set of WT and ACSL4 KO T cells treated with supplemental lipids.

Fig7e, Supp Fig8 - Neutrophils lipidomics: Lipidomic data set of WT neutrophils treated with supplemental lipids.

citationInfo.fullCitation: Lancaster, Graeme (2024). A lipid atlas of human and mouse immune cells provides insights into ferroptosis susceptibility. figshare. Dataset. https://doi.org/10.26180/25217357.v2
